tool_description:
Explore the House Plants API, a practical database designed for plant enthusiasts. 

Effortlessly retrieve detailed information on various house plants by querying names, common or Latin nomenclature, origin, climate preferences, and more. 

Gain insights into temperature requirements, sensitivities, diseases, and practical care instructions.
name: House Plants
title: House Plants

api_list.name: Get By Climate
api_list.description: Get plants by climate of their natural habitat.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://house-plants.p.rapidapi.com/climate/Tropical"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "house-plants.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://house-plants.p.rapidapi.com/climate/{climate}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "house-plants.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get By Latin Name
api_list.description: Retrieves all plants that match the provided Latin plant name.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://house-plants.p.rapidapi.com/latin/philodendron"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "house-plants.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Plants

api_list.name: Get By Common Name
api_list.description: Retrieves all plants that match a given common plant name.

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }
